translations.Deletes users that did not log in in the: Deletes users that did not log in in the last days.
translations.Users from LDAP are deleted locally only: Users from LDAP are deleted locally only, unless the LDAP write support app is enabled. When still available on LDAP, users will reappear.
translations.Users are deleted when they did not log: Users are deleted when they did not log into their account within the given number of days. This will also delete all files of the affected users.
